name: Reynaers Ltd
description:
Reynaers Aluminium is a leading European provider of innovative and sustainable architectural aluminium systems and has been established in the UK for over 20 years. Products offered include a wide range of window and door systems; curtain walling, sliding and swing-entrance doors, sliding folding doors, façade systems, Brise Soleil, conservatories, skylights, and systems for the incorporation of blinds and ventilation. We aim to achieve optimum effect in total façade construction - technically, aesthetically, economically and ecologically.

Established in 1965 and headquartered in Duffel (Belgium), Reynaers Aluminium has offices in 27 countries worldwide.

product_images.title: CW50 SC Structurally Clamped Curtain Walling
product_images.description: Part of the popular CW50 curtain walling system, CW50 SC is a structurally clamped façade system for maximum transparency. Reynaers curtain walls are designed to meet the requirements of contemporary architecture.

product_images.title: CW86 Hi Unitised Curtain Walling
product_images.description: CW86 Hi is highly insulated unitised façade, that can be completely pre-assembled in the workshop resulting in high execution and speed on building sites. The system can have motorised opening elements such as top hung or parallel opening windows.

product_images.title: CS86 Hi High Thermal Window & Door System
product_images.description: CS 86-HI is a multi-chamber system for windows and doors that combines aesthetic design, optimal stability and high thermal comfort. Due to the insulating skeleton strips, CS 86-HI achieves Uf-values down to 1.2 W/m²K, making this a highly energy efficient system.

product_images.title: CS104 High Thermal Window System for Passive Construction
product_images.description: A triple-glazed window system, with a Uw value of 0.78 W/m2K, for complete window frame, it meets and will be certified to the PassivHaus standards. The window system significantly reduces the potential heat loss through the window. Even on the coldest day, occupants will feel no discomfort when seated by such a window. Its triple glazing also means it has an exceptional acoustic performance.

product_images.title: CF77 Slim Line Folding Sliding Door
product_images.description: Reynaers Concept Folding 77, a sliding, folding system with unique features that combine openness with large dimensions while meeting the demands for high insulation. Extremely versatile and easy to use, the system offers two vent profiles and can be used to fully open up internal spaces, while providing three threshold solutions.

product_images.title: CP130 LS  Corner Closing Solution
product_images.description:
The stylish sliding system CP130 combines high security with effortless glide operation and the added benefit of a slim-line option. 
Additional solutions are now available for Reynaers’ comprehensive sliding door system CP130, once again enlarging the system’s extensive range and options.  

Now available as a corner closing solution exclusively for the CP130 Lift and Slide duorail variant, makes it possible to open up spaces without any fixed corner element. In combination with the system’s innovative low threshold for Lift and Slide duorail – only 20mm high – the indoors and outdoors can be connected making this the perfect solution for wide spans and high traffic applications, such as restaurant terraces.
